args: exec 2>/tmp/clojure-mcp-debug-7888.log && echo 'Starting MCP server...' >&2 && export CONFIG_PATH=/home/dissoc/.config/clojure/deps.edn && export PATH=/run/current-system/profile/bin:/home/dissoc/.guix-profile/bin:$PATH && source /home/dissoc/.guix-profile/etc/profile && export SSL_CERT_FILE=/home/dissoc/.guix-profile/etc/ssl/certs/ca-certificates.crt && export SSL_CERT_DIR=/home/dissoc/.guix-profile/etc/ssl/certs && export GIT_SSL_CAINFO=/home/dissoc/.guix-profile/etc/ssl/certs/ca-certificates.crt && echo "SSL_CERT_FILE=$SSL_CERT_FILE" >&2 && echo 'Environment loaded, starting clojure...' >&2 && exec clojure -X:mcp :port 7888

exec 2>/tmp/clojure-mcp-debug-8888.log && echo 'Starting MCP server...' >&2 && export CONFIG_PATH=/home/dissoc/.config/clojure/deps.edn && export PATH=/run/current-system/profile/bin:/home/dissoc/.guix-profile/bin:$PATH && source /home/dissoc/.guix-profile/etc/profile && export SSL_CERT_FILE=/home/dissoc/.guix-profile/etc/ssl/certs/ca-certificates.crt && export SSL_CERT_DIR=/home/dissoc/.guix-profile/etc/ssl/certs && export GIT_SSL_CAINFO=/home/dissoc/.guix-profile/etc/ssl/certs/ca-certificates.crt && echo "SSL_CERT_FILE=$SSL_CERT_FILE" >&2 && echo 'Environment loaded, starting clojure...' >&2 && exec clojure -X:mcp-shadow-dual :port 8888 :shadow-port 8889
